fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 gained 15.60 points or 0.09% to settle at 17,828. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 2.97% to 11.91. Infosys, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) and AU Small Finance Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The April 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 April 2023.
